name: Decision #3
description:
As he was muttering under his breath, he came to himself and saw that he had lost his way home. Meanwhile, he came across a bunch of fish.
Fishes asked him: what happened, why are you so dark and gloomy?  Although he did not like to talk to ordinary fishes but he told his story to them. Fishes told him that they knew a way which “Heart” could make lots of friends. The only condition is that he wants to change and try to grow. Although he did not want to leave the safe circle of his life at all, he asked fishes: What way? The little fish said,"Are you sure in your heart?"
The fish thought for a while and said: Yes, I am.
The fish consulted and then told him to go to the surface on the night when the moon was full. Heart thought about this on the way home.
